title: Bug 22659Function key events are often lost
description: This problem is very obviousin the debugger where it often takes two key strokes to perform actions likestepping (F5, F6, F7) and resuming (F8). The same problem exists in the editorwith F3.
OB: Bug 22659Function key events are often lost Build 20020820 (and some earlier)SWTGTK seems to lose a lot of function key events.
